Quick Start Guide¶

The easiest way to get started with using packerlabimaging is to follow Tutorial 1 - Initializing an Experiment. This tutorial demonstrates how to setup a new experiment inside packerlabimaging for data processing and analysis. The Experiment class is built from information provided for each constituent trial of the overall Experiment.

Then, to get started with plotting and data exploration, check out Tutorial 3 - Making useful plots.
